text:
We should do both: datasets should become a sub package. It should be divided in several modules, one of them with the atlases. All functions useful for users should be imported in the init. In addition, there should be a name convention. 

Sent from my phone. Please forgive brevity and mis spelling

I suggest:

datasets
- dataset.utils (for general purpose functions)
- datasets.atlas
- datasets.study (I think a better naming is possible here)
- datasets.template
